sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend } from 'recharts'; // Sample data for sales trends const salesData = [ { name: 'Mon', sales: 4000 }, { name: 'Tue', sales: 3000 }, { name: 'Wed', sales: 5000 }, { name: 'Thu', sales: 4000 }, { name: 'Fri', sales: 6000 }, { name: 'Sat', sales: 7000 }, { name: 'Sun', sales: 8000 }, ]; const Dashboard = () => { const totalSalesToday = 1500; // Example total sales today const totalSalesWeek = 10000; // Example total sales this week const totalSalesMonth = 40000; // Example total sales this month const incomingOrders = 20; // Example number of incoming orders const completedOrders = 15; // Example number of completed orders const pendingOrders = 5; // Example number of pending orders return (

Dashboard

Sales Overview

Total Sales Today: ${totalSalesToday}

Total Sales This Week: ${totalSalesWeek}

Total Sales This Month: ${totalSalesMonth}

Sales Trend

Order Statistics

Incoming Orders: {incomingOrders}

Completed Orders: {completedOrders}

Pending Orders: {pendingOrders}

); }; export default Dashboard;
